description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -chimpanzee
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
whether the participant was rewarded directly  with the content of the chosen paper strip or painted stripe  or reversely with the content of the non-chosen paper strip or painted stripe.
whether the food was presented on paper support or on painted stripes.
order in which study-specific conditions were presented
whether the paper strips or the painted stripes formed a cross or a pseudocross shape.
location of the food on the left or right distal end of the paper strips or painted stripes (from the focal participant's perspective).
selection of the left or right proximal end of the paper strips or painted stripes (from the focal participant's perspective).
whether or not the participant's choice brought the food.
